SELECT mb.boardno, mb.userNo, mb.title, mb.matchgametype, mb.matchregion, mb.membernum, TO_CHAR(mb.matchdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS matchdate, TO_CHAR(mb.boarddate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS boarddate, mb.count, mb.status, u.nick, COALESCE(ac.agreeCount, 0) AS agreeCount FROM matchboard mb JOIN users u ON u.userNo = mb.userNo LEFT JOIN ( SELECT boardNo, COUNT(*) AS agreeCount FROM attendusers WHERE status = 1 GROUP BY boardNo ) ac ON ac.boardNo = mb.boardno WHERE mb.userNo = #{userNo}
